programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Murder in Vegas (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Famed Civil Rights Attorney, Benjamin Crump, crafts a team of experts, friends, and relatives to investigate the iconic life and tragic death of Tupac Shakur, in hopes of finally bringing due process to Tupac's family.

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Crips vs Bloods
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Benjamin Crump and his team investigate the theory that a known gang member, Orlando Anderson, is responsible for the murder of Tupac Shakur. The team looks into never-before-seen footage of Orlando and examines his motive.

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Benjamin Crump and his team investigate the theory that the East Coast vs West Coast rap rivalry led to Tupac's murder. Were Biggie and P. Diddy involved? A key witness provides startling information.

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The investigative team dives into the chaotic relationship between Tupac Shakur and his label head, Marion "Suge" Knight. Was Tupac's departure from Death Row enough motive for Suge to turn on their friendship?

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Benjamin Crump and his team of experts examine the rumored Death Row coup that may have led to Tupac's murder. Who had the most to gain from his death?

programme.title: Who Killed Tupac? - Who Killed Tupac?
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Benjamin Crump and his team of experts analyze the authenticity of a recently revealed mystery confession letter. New evidence emerges that may break the case wide open.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Serial Killer Calls (#16)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 Homicide detectives led by Sgt. Doug Niemeier are drawn into a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a serial killer who calls 911 to direct them to bodies he's hidden around Kansas City.

programme.title: The First 48 - Twisted Honor / Vultures (#21)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 In Phoenix, Det. Dave Barnes must track down desperate lovers on the lam to solve a savage shotgun murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Snapshot
programme.desc: Season 17, Episode 26 In Tulsa, a young mother of four is found shot on the side of the road. Detectives' only clue is a photograph she took just moments before her murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Soldier Down/Blood Vendetta
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 11 In Atlanta, a young father is gunned down in cold blood at an abandoned car wash.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Love
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 10 In Tulsa, a young woman is brutally gunned down in broad daylight. And Detective Justin Ritter suspects the witnesses know more than they are saying.

programme.title: The First 48 - Live Bait / Drama at the Classic
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 9 In Minneapolis, a young man is robbed and killed while meeting up with a girl he met earlier on a bus. Sgts. Christopher Gaiters and Robert Dale need to find out if the murder was a random act of violence or if the girl the victim just met, set him up.

programme.title: Mt. Rainier Railroad - Mt. Rainier Railroad

programme.title: Dazzling Blue Lakeshore - Dazzling Blue Lakeshore
programme.desc: Season 1, Relaxing on the blue shoreline of New Zealand's famous Lake Pukaki; filmed in January 2017 on New Zealand's South Island.

programme.title: Beyond Blue Relaxation - Beyond Blue Relaxation
programme.desc: Season 1, Filmed on the exotic tropical island of Isla Mujeres, Mexico, just west of Cancun, "Beyond Blue" transports viewers to the breathtaking azure blue vistas found at the Garafon Natural Reef Park for one full hour of pure bliss.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Lazing the day away on a white sand beach in the Philippines as the sun gently sets on the horizon.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Consummate Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 118 The case of an Irish woman, Rachel O’Reilly, her savage murder, and the groundbreaking investigation that put her remorseless killer behind bars.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Unravelling the Murder of Janet Commins
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 119 The case of a brutal murder, a terrible injustice, and how a new, dedicated police team and DNA profiling eventually caught up with the killer, 40 years after the crime was committed.

programme.title: The First 48 - Last Wish
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 14 In Miami, after a celebrating his 46th birthday with family, a man is found dead on a residential sidewalk.

programme.title: The First 48 - Road Hazard/Cold
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 17 In Birmingham, Det. Chris Anderson works to unravel the mystery of a motorcycle club president shot in the head after being run off the road. And Louisville Det. Corey Cadwell races against the clock to catch the killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - In Broad Daylight/Fight Club
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 18 In Birmingham, Detective Chris Anderson and the homicide team investigate the brutal murder of a young woman shot to death in a park in the middle of the day. Detectives must first discover the identity of the victim.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Torched/Girl Fight
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Freddie Ponce arrests a man who tortured and killed his childhood friend. The case is strong--until an unexpected event in the first days of trial puts the whole thing in jeopardy.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Tag Team/Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 In Memphis, TN, Lt. Caroline Mason revisits the 2007 homicide of a 19-year-old man shot to death during a street fight that got out of hand.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Stolen Lives/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 In Miami, Florida, 25-year-old Pedro Roteta is stabbed in the middle of the street and left to die. Despite video of the murder and a confession the defense attempts to get immunity based on the controversial "Stand Your Ground" law.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Targeted Teacher
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 102 The murder of a respected college professor sends shockwaves through suburban Richmond, Virginia. Cops investigate the homicide nonstop until evidence reveals a cold-blooded killer's premeditated plot.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Missing in Minnesota
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 103 Police in northern Minnesota rush to rescue a kidnapped college student. It takes NASA technology for law enforcement to uncover the identity of the abductor, who turns out to be a serial predator.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Killer Hand
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 104 The slaying of a casino worker in Las Vegas, Nevada, sends panic through Sin City. When cops investigate, they uncover a murder conspiracy that is months in the making.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Intern Gone Missing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When government intern Chandra Levy goes missing just hours after she decides to move to a new city, detectives discover she may have been having an affair with a senator.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Namaslay
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 When she's caught stealing, an aspiring 20-something lifestyle blogger tries to prevent herself from being fired and gets locked up for murder instead.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Iron Murphy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 In Prohibition-era Chicago, a down-and-out barfly looks like the perfect target for a get-rich-quick insurance scheme. That is, until he refuses to keel over.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suspicions
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 A pioneering Ferengi scientist Is found dead, and Beverly risks her career to prove he was murdered.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Rightful Heir
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 Worf finds his faith sorely tested when it appears that the greatest Klingon warrior of all time has returned from the dead to reclaim the empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Second Chances
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 Riker's exact duplicate is discovered on Nervala IV. His first order of business: resume his relationship with Deanna. Second order: obey orders from his superior - himself.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Timescape
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Aboard a shuttlecraft and en route back to the Enterprise, Picard, LaForge, Data, and Troi find themselves trapped in a time trap of some sort, where the Enterprise is being taken over by Romulans, and the ship, itself, on a course of destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent - Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 When the Borg return to do battle with the Federation, they boast a new individuality - and tempt Data when they help him feel his first emotion.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Picard, Troi, and Geordi are held prisoner by Data, who has left the Enterprise to join his evil brother Lore as leaders of the Borg.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Liaisons
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 While the crew plays host to ambassadors from an alien race, Picard is stranded on a barren planet with a woman who falls desperately in love with him.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Interface
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 Geordi defies Picard's commands and risks his life in what appears to be a futile attempt to rescue his missing mother.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Gambit (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 4 Riker is shocked to find Picard, who has been missing and presumed dead, posing as a mercenary on an alien ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Gambit (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 Picard and Riker masquerade as mercenaries in order to retrieve a potentially lethal Vulcan artifact.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Phantasms
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 6 Data's first bad dream turns into a real-life nightmare for the rest of the Enterprise crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Dark Page
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 Troi must probe her mother's psyche when a traumatic secret causes a psychic breakdown that threatens Lwaxana's life.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Attached
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 8 Imprisoned and telepathically joined by an alien race, Picard and Beverly are forced to face the feelings they have always had for each other.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E17 - The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Crais and Talyn return. The crew are put on trial for an attack that Talyn made on an alien ship.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S2 E18 - A Clockwork Nebari
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 A Nebari group comes aboard Moya and attempts to mind cleanse everyone using a drug. Pilot and Rygel are the only two who can resist the effects.

programme.title: Supernova - Episode 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Worldwide panic ensues when a scientist predicts that the sun will explode, bringing about the end of the world in seven days.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Investigations
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Neelix helps smoke out the crewmember who has been passing Federation secrets to the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Deadlock
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A space anomaly generates a duplicate Voyager and crew, but only one ship can survive an assault by Vidiian invaders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Innocence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 After crash-landing on a moon, Tuvok encounters three terrified children who claim they've been brought there to die.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Thaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 Thanks to a complex sensory system controlled by a computer, Kim and others are literally held hostage by fear.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tuvix
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A bizarre occurrence during transport causes Tuvok and Neelix to fuse into one alien humanoid known as "Tuvix."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resolutions
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 After contracting a deadly virus, Janeway and Chakotay are forced into exile on a planet that shields them from the effects of the fatal disease.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 26 Using Chakotay's son as a pawn, Seska lures Voyager into an explosive showdown with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Basics, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 While the crew fights for survival on a primitive planet, a lone crewmember battles the Kazon who have taken over the Voyager ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flashback
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 Tuvok experiences a repressed memory that's linked to his first Starfleet assignment under the command of the renowned Captain Sulu.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Chute
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Convicted of a crime they didn't commit, Paris and Kim may spend the rest of their lives in a hellish prison.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Swarm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 While the crew battles a swarm of alien ships, Kes struggles to stop the Doctor's memory circuits from deteriorating.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - False Profits
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 The crew tries to free the people of the planet Takar from two Ferengi opportunists posing as gods.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Remember
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 Torres is troubled by a series of dreams in which she seems to be reliving another woman's life.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 This episode includes: RFK, Voice From the Grave, Update: Thanks Captain Sharp and No One Spared.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 This episode includes: Update: Where's Kari?, Amelia Earhart (Pts. 1 & 2), Richard's Rampage & UD and Miami Vice & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 1 This episode includes: Zodiac/Unabomber & UD, UD: Newsman's Lost Love, Missing College Kids & UD, Trish's Miracle and Picture Taking Fugitive.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 This episode includes: Robin Hood Rabbi & UD, Missing In-Laws & UD, To Madame with Love and Deadly Dumpster

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 11 This episode includes: San Marino Bones & UD, Phantom Sub, Police Captain's Death, UD: Baby Girl X and School Bus Family & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 This episode includes: The Man Who Knew Too Much, Update: Sweetheart Swindler, Dark Dante & UD and The Promise & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 2 This episode includes: Deadly Doses & UD, Missing Bird People, Baby's Breath and Fawzi's Son & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 19 This episode includes: Patience Worth, Fugitive Counterfeiter & UD, A.W.O.L., and Hitchhiking Killer & UD.

programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 This episode includes: Kidnapped Executive, Hansen Twin Murder (Pts. 1 & 2) and NATO Soldier's Dad.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: MST3K: The Painted Hills - The Painted Hills
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.

programme.title: MST3K: Zombie Nightmare - MST3K: Zombie Nightmare
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: MST3K: The Atomic Brain - MST3K: The Atomic Brain
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A rich, elderly woman wants her doctor to transplant her brain into the body of one of her young captives.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell - Mitchell
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.

programme.title: MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy - MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Scientists search for the ancient breastplate of a mummy, culminating in a mad scientist's attempt to fight the creature through the construction of a robot.

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: MST3K: Pod People - MST3K: Pod People
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.title: Away & Back - Away & Back
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jack Peterson, a widowed father of three young children, encounters Ginny Newsom, a wildlife biologist, whose mission is tracking trumpeter swans, a family of which settles on a pond on the Peterson farm.

programme.title: Good Witch - Surprise Me
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles - A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With a little help from an angel, Christmas miracles happen for a homeless family. Stars Patty Duke, Laura Dern, Carla Gugino, Lynn Redgrave, and Kathy Baker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Away & Back - Away & Back
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jack Peterson, a widowed father of three young children, encounters Ginny Newsom, a wildlife biologist, whose mission is tracking trumpeter swans, a family of which settles on a pond on the Peterson farm.

programme.title: For Love & Honor - For Love & Honor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a by-the-book army veteran takes over as commandant at a military academy, he instantly squares off with the school's new Dean of Academics. But when they are forced to work together to help save the school, sparks fly.

programme.title: Cupid & Cate - Cupid & Cate
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mary-Louise Parker stars as a vibrant young woman who breaks off an uninspired relationship when she falls for a witty and kind young lawyer. Also stars Peter Gallagher and Bebe Neuwirth. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Loving Leah - Loving Leah
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - 2001
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Proving Ground
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - 48 Hours
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 During a pursuit by the Goa'uld gliders, Teal'c fails to make it through the Stargate before it is destroyed. Now SG-1 has only 48 hours to reestablish Teal'c's energy signature from the temporary memory of the Stargate before it's erased…for good!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Summit
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 A truce is declared among the Goa'uld, so that the warlords can attend a summit on the future of universe domination. As Jackson speaks fluent Goa'uld, he is sent to the summit disguised as an aide. But his real mission is to poison the delegates!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Last Stand
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 Embattled and under siege, SG-1 attempts to escape a Goa'uld search and destroy mission bent on finding them and the secret crystal they carry. Meanwhile, the balance of life is threatened by the reappearance of the evil System Lord Anubis.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Fail Safe
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 As an asteroid hurtles toward Earth, SG-1 uses an abandoned Goa'uld ship as a launch pad for a mega-bomb designed to destroy the rock before impact. But when SGC loses the ship's signal, it's feared that the team is dead and that Earth is in peril.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Adrift
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 1 When Atlantis starts shutting down due to a damaged power system, Rodney McKay turns off all non-essential systems. But in just 28 hours, McKay realizes the city’s shields may fail completely and its inhabitants will succumb the vacuum of space.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Lifeline
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 2 Lt. Col. Sheppard leads a daring raid to secure a ZPM that will save Atlantis. When the Replicators become aware of the incursion into their city, Sheppard’s team must keep them at bay or else abandon the mission and their hope of saving Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 3 Ronon reconnects with a group of Satedans from his past who enlist the Atlantis team's help on a dangerous mission against the Wraith. But after the Atlantis crew is captured, Ronon is faced with the truth about his old friends’ new loyalties.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Doppelganger
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 4 During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Travelers
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.
